constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 137 (Friday, August 19, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. JOHNSON of South Dakota:
H.R. 8734.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article IV, Section 3, Clause 2: ``The Congress shall have
power to dispose of and make all needful rules and
regulations respecting the territory or other property
belonging to the United States.''
[Page H7716]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

title: Mount Rushmore Protection Act
